title: Schizotype releases Gaden Sans
content:
Schizotype is proud to announce the launch of Gaden Sans, a sleek monoline sans. To coincide with the launch, people buying the whole family (which already represents a saving of $170 over buying the styles separately!) can choose one font (family) from 18 other Schizotypefaces to receive free of charge.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/gaden-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714161241/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/gaden-sans/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/gaden-sans/")

Cheers  
Dave
author: daverowland
